Accuse.definition: to charge with an offense judicially or by a public process compare indict vi
Accuse.origin: [Latin accusare to find fault with, charge with a crime, from ad to, at + causa legal case, trial]

ac·cus·ing.definition: [Latinto find fault with, charge with a crime, fromto, at +legal case, trial]to charge with an offense judicially or by a public process compareto make or bring an accusation
